long_description: The expanded and updated. Authors: Wills Young and Mick Ryan. Softcover; 427 pages; full-color photographs; illustrations; maps. Wolverine Publishing; copyright 2010. The town of Bishop, in eastern California, is a boulderer's paradise. This is one of the few places where a high concentration of world-class bouldering combines with magnificent scenery and convenient amenities. Provides complete coverage of the Buttermilk Country, The Happy and Sad Boulders, The Druid Stones, and Rock Creek and The Sherwin Plateau.
short_description: The expanded and updated Bishop Bouldering details more than 2,000 problems at this internationally popular climbing destination.
